humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that metastatic carcinoma is found in twelve of thirteen axillary lymph nodes. This corresponds to N3 stage as per Rule 13: N3 indicates metastases in 4 or more axillary lymph nodes. The exact number of positive lymph nodes is provided in the report, which is 12, and it is more than 4, so the N3 stage is confirmed.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in twelve of thirteen axillary lymph nodes, including all three sentinel lymph nodes. This meets the criteria for pN3a.
